cshelp.title: Server
cshelp.shortdesc: The Server page shows information about your servers and allows to perform platform management functions on your servers.

csbody.p: Use these sections to add server, power on server, power off server and remove server.

dlentry.dd: The Add Server option allows to add a server to be managed. It requires user defined name for server, IP address, IPMI User name(optional) and password. The user defined name and IP address has to be unique for servers being managed.

The Remove option allows to remove a server that is being managed. Power On The Power On option allows to power on the server being managed.
Power Off The Power Off option allows to power off the server being managed.
System Event Logs The System Logs option allows to view and delete all the System Event Logs.
Sensor Data Records The Sensor data records option allows to view all the sensor details and corresponding values.
System Temperature Reading The System Temperature Reading option allows to view temperature reading of the sensors.
